subject: ControlUp alert mail - ESX Hypervisor Maintenance off -
body:
This is an automated alert from ControlUp, which you requested to receive using an incident trigger. 

	
The monitored resource has matched the conditions specified below.


     Organization Name: Bitzer


     Folder name: bitzer\hypervisors\vcenter\de-sdn\de-sdn-syn-inf


     Reported by: ControlUp Monitor Service on DESDN01126


     Trigger name: ESX Hypervisor Maintenance off <controlup://incidents/ESX Hypervisor Maintenance off> 


     Resource name: desdn17226.bitzer.biz <controlup://incidents/desdn17226.bitzer.biz> 


     Resource type: Hosts


     Stress Level: Advanced


     Incident timestamp (UTC +1 W. Europe Standard Time): 12/6/2025 1:01:47 AM


     Columns involved in this incident:


      Column: Maintenance Mode <controlup://incidents/Maintenance Mode> 


      Value changed from 0 to Disabled


      On (UTC +1 W. Europe Standard Time): 12/6/2025 1:01:17 AM


      Threshold crossed: 0 

In order to configure which e-mail alerts you receive, please open ControlUp and edit the settings for the trigger specified above.
